pages.home.title: Talos Pioneers
pages.home.description: Talos Pioneers is a currently work-in-progress community resource for Arknights: Endfield, acting as a means for fellow Endministrators to share their Automated Industry Complex (AIC) blueprints to each other.

mainBanner.description: Talos Pioneers is a currently work-in-progress community resource for Arknights: Endfield, acting as a means for fellow Endministrators to share their Automated Industry Complex (AIC) blueprints to each other.

auth.login.title: LOG IN
auth.login.successMessage: We've sent you a magic link to log in. Please check your email and click the link to complete your login.
auth.login.instructions: The magic link will expire in 72 hours. If you don't see the email, please check your spam folder.
auth.register.title: REGISTER
auth.register.successMessage: Registration successful! We've sent you a magic link to complete your registration. Please check your email and click the link to finish setting up your account.
auth.register.instructions: The magic link will expire in 72 hours. If you don't see the email, please check your spam folder.
pages.about.title: About Talos Pioneers
pages.about.description: Learn more about Talos Pioneers, a community resource for sharing Arknights: Endfield blueprints.
pages.about.projectDescription: Talos Pioneers is a community resource for Arknights: Endfield, designed to help Endministrators share their Automated Industry Complex (AIC) blueprints with each other. The platform allows players to create, share, like, and comment on game blueprints using shareable codes that can be pasted directly into the game. Users can organize blueprints into collections, upload new blueprints, and interact with the community through comments and likes.
pages.about.disclaimerText: Talos Pioneers is a fan project and is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or associated with Hypergryph, Gryphline, or Arknights: Endfield. All game-related content, including but not limited to characters, items, facilities, and game mechanics, are the property of their respective owners.
pages.about.feedbackDescription: We welcome your feedback, suggestions, and bug reports! Please share your thoughts with us on GitHub.
pages.about.specialThanksDescription: We would like to extend our gratitude to the following individuals and communities for their contributions and support:
pages.privacy.title: Privacy Policy
pages.privacy.description: Learn how Talos Pioneers collects, uses, and protects your personal information.
pages.privacy.introductionText: At Talos Pioneers, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform. Please read this policy carefully to understand our practices regarding your personal data.
pages.privacy.informationWeCollectDescri: We collect information that you provide directly to us and information that is automatically collected when you use our services.
pages.privacy.userAccountDataText: When you create an account, we collect your username, email address, and any profile information you choose to provide. If you register using OAuth providers (Discord or Google), we may also collect your profile picture and other information made available by the provider.
pages.privacy.blueprintDataText: We collect the blueprints you create and share, including titles, descriptions, codes, images, and associated metadata such as facilities, items, tags, and game version information.
pages.privacy.commentDataText: We collect comments you post on blueprints, including the content of your comments and associated metadata.
pages.privacy.automaticallyCollectedText: We automatically collect certain information when you use our services, including your IP address, browser type, device information, and usage patterns. We also use cookies and similar technologies to manage your session and preferences.
pages.privacy.howWeUseDescription: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, including:
pages.privacy.howWeUseList2: Processing and displaying your blueprints and content
pages.privacy.howWeUseList4: Moderating content to ensure community safety
pages.privacy.howWeUseList5: Communicating with you about your account and our services
pages.privacy.howWeUseList6: Analyzing usage patterns to improve our platform
pages.privacy.authenticationEmail: Email and Password: We use magic links sent to your email address for passwordless authentication.
pages.privacy.authenticationOAuth: OAuth Providers: You can sign in using Discord or Google. When you choose to authenticate via OAuth, the provider shares certain information with us (such as your email address and profile picture) in accordance with their privacy policies.
pages.privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies to maintain your authentication state. These cookies are essential for the platform to function properly and allow you to remain logged in across sessions. You can control cookies through your browser settings, but disabling cookies may affect your ability to use certain features of our platform.
pages.privacy.contentModerationText: To maintain a safe and respectful community, we use automated content moderation powered by OpenAI's moderation API. This system reviews blueprint titles, descriptions, images, and comments to identify potentially harmful or inappropriate content. Content that violates our community guidelines may be automatically flagged or removed.
pages.privacy.dataStorageText: We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your personal data, we cannot guarantee absolute security.
pages.privacy.userRightsList1: Access and review your personal information
pages.privacy.userRightsList2: Update or correct your account information
pages.privacy.userRightsList3: Delete your account and associated data
pages.privacy.userRightsList4: Request a copy of your data
pages.privacy.userRightsList5: Opt out of certain data collection practices
pages.privacy.thirdPartyText: Our platform integrates with third-party services, including:
pages.privacy.thirdPartyList3: Cloudflare for hosting and content delivery
pages.privacy.thirdPartyNote: These services have their own privacy policies, and we encourage you to review them. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third-party services.
pages.privacy.changesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. Your continued use of our services after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the updated policy.
pages.privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us through our GitHub discussions:
